basicInfo.desc: This task sets the expression of a RW Document Condition Selector Control.

parameter.name: messageID
parameter.desc: The Message ID of a previously executed Report Writer Document.

parameter.name: unitKeyContext
parameter.desc: The key context of the Selector Control. It may be a simple key for the control or a key with tree type and node type (all separated by ITEM_SEPARATOR). Multiple attribute will be separated by CONTROL_GROUP_BY_SEPARATOR (see EnumRWBeanEvents for details).

parameter.name: ctlKey
parameter.desc: The key of the Selector Control

parameter.name: objectID
parameter.desc: The object id of the selector source

parameter.name: objType
parameter.desc: The object type of the selector source

parameter.name: expConstants
parameter.desc: Constant values which are joined with ITEM_SEPARATOR

parameter.name: dataType
parameter.desc: data type of the constants in the expression

parameter.name: usePartDisplay
parameter.desc: The key for the grid in a document. It excludes the slice
